gates.info: Gate 1 is located near the east entrance. It's the first gate you will see upon entering the terminal.
Gate 2 is located next to the baggage claim area. It has a view of the runway.
Gate 3 is situated in the north wing. It is close to several food outlets.
Gate 12 is located near the central food court. It has comfortable seating and charging stations.
Gate 15 is close to the north terminal exit. It is near the shops and offers free Wi-Fi.

restaurants.name: The Gourmet Bistro
restaurants.details: Offers a variety of international dishes and has both indoor and outdoor seating.

restaurants.name: Fast Bite
restaurants.details: Quick service with a selection of burgers, fries, and drinks.

restaurants.name: Cafe Express
restaurants.details: Provides coffee, pastries, and light snacks.

lounges.name: VIP Lounge
lounges.details: Exclusive lounge with premium services including snacks, beverages, and comfortable seating.

lounges.name: Business Lounge
lounges.details: Quiet area with workstations, Wi-Fi, and refreshments.

services.name: Lost and Found
services.details: For lost items and assistance, located in the central area of the terminal.

services.name: Information Desk
services.details: Provides information on flight status, directions, and general inquiries.

services.name: Baggage Services
services.details: For lost luggage and baggage-related services.

directions.details: Follow signs to the central food court. Gate 12 is located nearby.
Walk straight past the shops and you will reach Gate 15.
Head towards the south terminal. The VIP Lounge is located in the southern part of the terminal.
